metadata.title: CVE-2018-19800 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
aubio v0.4.0 to v0.4.8 has a Buffer Overflow in new_aubio_tempo.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-19800` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

aubio-tools - 0.4.9-2
libaubio5 - 0.4.9-2
python3-aubio - 0.4.9-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: aubio package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.4.9-2').
